description:
syscall, os: add syscall.GetFileNameByHandle and always open a real fd for directory in os.OpenFile
so that syscall.GetFileNameByHandle(syscall.Handle(dirFile.Fd())) works.

NOTE: the path returned by GetFileNameByHandle is not directly usable, I don't know how to fix this.

This is meant to provide a facility for (*File).Chdir() and the like.
subject: syscall, os: add syscall.GetFileNameByHandle and always...
